Detailed Description

Manages a single poll.

This class allows the user to add/remove/fetch questions from the poll, default chart type is pie When info is changed in the object the changes is not saved before the Poll::save method is called

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Poll::Poll (  &$  db,
$  id = null,
$  projectID = null
) 
 

Constructor

Parameters:
$db a reference to a PEAR::DB object
$id the id of the poll, must be numeric
$projectID the if of the project to associate this poll if the id is set to null a new poll will be created if the id could not be found and is not null, Poll::isError will return an Error object

Member Function Documentation

Poll::addQuestion (  $  questionObject  ) 
 

add a question to the poll, add is not made permanent before the Poll::save is called

Parameters:
$questionObject a Question object to add to the poll
Returns:
true on sucess, false on failure, if the call failed Poll::isError() will return an Error object

Poll::delete (   ) 
 

Deletes the poll and all question owned by the poll when this method has been called you should unset() the object if the call sucesseded

Returns:
false on error, true on sucess. If error Project::isError will return an Error object describing the error

Get the Chart object

Returns:
the Chart object owned by the poll

Poll::getChartType (   ) 
 

Get the chart type, ie. Pie, Colum, Row aso.

Returns:
string with the chart type

Poll::getQuestion (  $  questionID  ) 
 

Return the Question object with the supplied ID if the Question is owned by the poll

Parameters:
$questionID id of the question to fetch
Returns:
true on sucess, false on failure, if the call failed Poll::isError() will return an Error object

Poll::getQuestions (   ) 
 

Return an array of all Question objects owned by the poll

Returns:
array of Question objects in the poll 
        Will output the data ordered in this way.
        Array(
            [0] => Object Question
            [1] => Object Question
        )

the vote buttons text

Poll::isError (   ) 
 

If the last method call failed this function will return an Error::Error object otherwise it will return false,

Returns:
false or an Error::Error object

Poll::removeQuestion (  $  questionID  ) 
 

Delete an question from the poll, this deletes all info of the question. the question must belong to the poll to be deleted

Parameters:
$questionID id of the question to remove, must belong to the poll
Returns:
true on sucess, false on failure, if the call failed Poll::isError() will return an Error object

Poll::save (   ) 
 

save the changes to the poll

Returns:
false on error, true on sucess. If error Project::isError will return an Error object describing the error

Poll::selectInterval (  $  startTime,
$  stopTime
) 
 

Select interval that the poll should be shown

Parameters:
$startTime unix timestamp start time
$stopTime unix timestamp stop time

Poll::selectPeriodic (  $  day  ) 
 

Selecte the day that the poll should be shown monday = 0... sunday = 6

Parameters:
$day numeric weekday

Poll::setChartType (  $  type  ) 
 

Change the charttype, the chart object in the poll will change but the change will not be made permanent until Poll::save is called

Parameters:
$type string with new chart type, eg. Pie, Colum, Row
Returns:
true on sucess, false on error, if error Poll::isError will return an Error object

Poll::setProjectID (  $  id  ) 
 

sets the projectID of a poll, the poll project id will not be saved before Poll::save is called. if a new Project object is created with the same id as the one set with this call but before Poll::save is called the poll will be included in the Project object

Parameters:
$id the id of the project to associate the poll
Returns:
true if a project with the id exists, false otherwise, if false Poll::isError will return an Error object

Poll::setTitle (  $  title  ) 
 

Set the title of the poll, will not be made permanent before the Poll::save method is called

Parameters:
$title the title of the poll
Returns:
true on sucess, false on failure, if the call failed Poll::isError() will return an Error object

Poll::setVoteText (  $  text  ) 
 

Set the text of the vote button shown to the users of the poll, will not be made permanent before the Poll::save method is called

Parameters:
$text the vote buttons text
Returns:
true on sucess, false on failure, if the call failed Poll::isError() will return an Error object

Poll::vote (  $  questionID  ) 
 

Add one to the question with the supplied id

Parameters:
$questionID the id of the question, must be numeric

Member Data Documentation

Poll::$chart = null
 

private var, contains the chart object

Poll::$chartType = "Pie"
 

private var, contains the chart type we use to construct the chart object

Poll::$id = null
 

private var, contains the id of the poll

Poll::$isError = false
 

private var, contains either false if no error or an Error object if there was an error in the last method call se also Error::Error and Poll::isError

Poll::$projectID = null
 

private var, contains the id of the project this poll is owned by

Poll::$questions = array()
 

private var, contain the question object owned by the poll

Poll::$title = null
 

private var, contains the title of the poll

Poll::$voteText = null
 

private var, contains the text used on the vote button on the poll
